query: WITH entities AS (SELECT id FROM core_payment_allocations WHERE (COALESCE(id < $2, true)) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $3 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_payment_allocation_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
